Scripts.OnLoad: local x, y = self:GetSize() self.NormalTexture:SetSize(x, y) self.HighlightTexture:SetSize(x, y)

Scripts.OnEnter:
self:GetParent():LockHighlight()
local tooltipText = self:GetAttribute("tooltipText") local tooltip = tooltipText and _G[tooltipText] if tooltip then GlueTooltip:SetOwner(self) GlueTooltip:SetText(tooltip) GlueTooltip:Show() end
if self.tooltip then GlueTooltip:SetOwner(self) GlueTooltip:SetText(self.tooltip, 1.0, 1.0, 1.0) GlueTooltip:Show() end

if self:IsEnabled() ~= 1 and not CharacterServiceBoostFlowFrame:IsShown() then GlueTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_BOTTOM", 0, -10) GlueTooltip:SetText(CHARACTER_UNDELETE_NOT_CHARACTER) GlueTooltip:Show() end
